content.question: Three cylindrical containers are filled with water to the same height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math>, as shown. Container <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> is open at the top. Container <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> and Container <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> each have a solid cap, made of the same material and with the same thickness, that rests on the top surface of the water. Assume that the cap makes a seal with the edges of the container and that frictional forces between the cap and the container are negligible. The diameters of Container <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> are equal, while the diameter of Container <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> is greater than that of Containers <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the absolute pressure <math alttext="P sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>, <math alttext="P sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>, and <math alttext="P sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></math> at the bottom of Containers <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub A equals P sub B, which equals P sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub A equals P sub B, close parenthesis, which is greater than P sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub B equals P sub C, close parenthesis, is greater than P sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="P sub C is greater than P sub B, which is greater than P sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>C</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>
